onboarding.title: You are a professor or staff?
onboarding.body: You are logged in but do not have any rights yet. If you are a professor or staff, please fill out the form so that we can assign you to your research group and grant the appropriate rights. Please click the button below to do so.

email.subject: Request: Access to research group in TUMApply
email.body:
=== IMPORTANT NOTES ===
- Please do not change the subject of this email.
- Please fill out all required fields below.
- The optional fields do not have to be filled out.
- Please send this email from your official TUM email address.
=== IMPORTANT NOTES ===



=== Required ===

Personal information:
- Title (Prof./Dr./…): 
- First name: 
- Last name: 
- TUM ID (e.g. ab12cde): 

Information about the research group:
- Head (title, first and last name): 
- Name: 


=== Optional ===

Information about the research group:
- Abbreviation: 
- Contact email: 
- Website: 
- School: 
- Description: 
- Default field of studies: 
- Address:
  - Street and number: 
  - Postal code: 
  - City:

employeeRequest.notice:
Please enter the name of the professor you will be working with or who will supervise you.
Your request will be sent to the administrators. They will assign you to the research group of the professor you entered and contact you.

confirmDialog.message: Your request will be sent to the administrators for review. They will assign you to the research group of the specified professor and then contact you. Would you like to continue?

success.detail: Your employee access request has been submitted. Administrators will review it and contact you soon.

error.detail: Failed to submit your request. Please try again or contact support.

professorRequest.approvalNotice: Please note: The approval process for your research group may take a few days. Our administrators will review your request and contact you once it has been approved.
professorRequest.optionalHint: The following fields are optional and can be filled in later.

researchGroupName.label: Name
researchGroupName.placeholder: e.g. Research Group for Artificial Intelligence

researchGroupDescription.label: Description
researchGroupDescription.placeholder: Describe briefly your group's research focus, goals, and key areas.

confirmDialog.message: Your request will be sent to the administrators for review. They will create your research group and contact you once it's approved. Do you want to proceed?

success.detail: Your research group request has been submitted. Administrators will review it and contact you soon.

error.detail: Failed to submit your request. Please try again or contact support.

loadDataFailed.detail: Failed to load schools and departments. Please refresh the page or try again later.

errorDuplicateName.detail: A research group with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.

errorUserNotFound.detail: No user was found with the provided TUM-ID. Please check the TUM-ID.
